name: apage
title: Apage
author: Rich Plastow <rich@richplastow.com> (http://richplastow.com/)
description: Generate a page from lots of markdown

scripts.source: npm run v:head --loglevel silent | cat - node_modules/akaybe/src/*.litcoffee src/*.litcoffee
scripts.build: npm run source --loglevel silent | coffee --stdio --literate --compile > build/apage.js
scripts.watch: nodemon -x "npm run source --loglevel silent | cat - test/*.litcoffee | coffee -slc > build/test/apage-with-test.js" -e litcoffee -w src -w test
scripts.v:head:
echo "    ###! $npm_package_title $npm_package_version //// $npm_package_license Licence //// $npm_package_homepage ###
    I = '$npm_package_title'
    V = '$npm_package_version'
"
